name: Customer Lifetime Value
definition: Total revenue expected from a customer over their relationship
description: Critical metric for customer profitability analysis and marketing ROI

name: Net Promoter Score
definition: Customer loyalty and satisfaction measurement
description: Key indicator of customer satisfaction and referral potential

name: Customer Acquisition Cost
definition: Total cost to acquire a new customer
description: Measures marketing efficiency and customer acquisition strategy

name: Customer Retention Rate
definition: Percentage of customers retained over a period
description: Indicates customer satisfaction and service quality

name: Revenue per Customer
definition: Average revenue generated per customer
description: Measures customer value and sales effectiveness

name: Employee Productivity
definition: Output per employee per hour
description: Measures operational efficiency and workforce optimization

name: Process Cycle Time
definition: Time to complete a business process
description: Indicates process optimization and workflow efficiency

name: Digital Adoption Rate
definition: Percentage of customers using digital channels
description: Measures digital transformation success and customer engagement

name: System Uptime
definition: Percentage of time systems are operational
description: Critical for customer service and operational continuity

name: Data Quality Score
definition: Accuracy and completeness of data
description: Essential for decision-making and regulatory compliance

name: Compliance Score
definition: Adherence to regulatory requirements
description: Critical for regulatory compliance and risk management

name: Risk Score
definition: Overall risk assessment rating
description: Measures overall risk exposure and management effectiveness

name: Innovation Index
definition: Measure of innovation initiatives and outcomes
description: Indicates innovation culture and future competitiveness

name: Market Share
definition: Percentage of market controlled by the company
description: Key competitive position indicator

name: Customer Satisfaction Score
definition: Overall customer satisfaction rating
description: Comprehensive measure of customer experience quality

name: Patient Satisfaction Score
definition: Overall patient satisfaction with healthcare services
description: Critical metric for healthcare quality and patient outcomes

name: Average Length of Stay
definition: Average number of days patients stay in hospital
description: Measures operational efficiency and care quality

name: Readmission Rate
definition: Percentage of patients readmitted within 30 days
description: Indicates care quality and discharge planning effectiveness

name: Operating Room Utilization
definition: Percentage of time operating rooms are in use
description: Measures surgical efficiency and resource utilization

name: Medication Error Rate
definition: Percentage of medication errors per 1000 doses
description: Critical patient safety indicator

name: Staff Turnover Rate
definition: Percentage of staff leaving annually
description: Measures employee satisfaction and retention

name: Revenue per Patient
definition: Average revenue generated per patient visit
description: Measures financial efficiency and patient value

name: Insurance Claim Processing Time
definition: Average time to process insurance claims
description: Measures administrative efficiency and cash flow

name: Digital Health Adoption
definition: Percentage of patients using digital health tools
description: Measures digital transformation success

name: Clinical Outcomes Score
definition: Overall clinical outcomes and success rates
description: Comprehensive measure of clinical effectiveness

name: Emergency Response Time
definition: Average time to respond to emergency calls
description: Critical for emergency care effectiveness

name: Patient Wait Time
definition: Average time patients wait for appointments
description: Measures patient access and satisfaction

name: Cost per Patient
definition: Average cost to treat a patient
description: Measures cost efficiency and resource utilization

name: Infection Rate
definition: Rate of hospital-acquired infections
description: Critical patient safety and quality indicator

name: Telehealth Utilization
definition: Percentage of appointments conducted via telehealth
description: Measures digital transformation and accessibility

name: Manufacturing Efficiency
definition: Overall equipment effectiveness in production
description: Measures production efficiency and equipment utilization

name: Quality Defect Rate
definition: Percentage of products with defects
description: Critical quality indicator for customer satisfaction

name: Inventory Turnover
definition: Number of times inventory is sold annually
description: Measures inventory management efficiency
